name.value: O Bom, o Mau e o Mexicano

item.description:
Welcome to The Good, the Bad and the Mexican! Travel to the past and be the fastest trigger in the wild west!

The Good, the Bad and the Mexican uses an innovative card draw and discard mechanic, which requires decisions and risks for you and your opponents! Plan your moves with a mix of Uno to get ahead or complicate the lives of other players.

But remember, you are not alone in this duel! Your opponents also aim for victory, and will make your way a real challenge!

DRAW, PILGRIM!

How to play?
Each player starts with four cards, and the object of the game is to collect five cards of the same color or value. On the player's turn, he draws a card from the top of the deck or the top card from the discard pile, and must discard another card from his hand. When discarding a card, the text of the card is activated, such as skipping the next player's turn.

—description from the designer

Bem-vindo a “O Bom, o Mau e o Mexicano”! Viaje para o passado e seja o gatilho mais rápido do velho oeste!

“O Bom, O Mau e o Mexicano” usa uma inovadora mecânica de compra e descarte de cartas, que exigem decisões e riscos para você e os seus adversários! Planeje suas jogadas com um misto de “Uno” e “Cacheta” para sair na frente ou complicar a vida dos outros jogadores.

Mas lembre-se, você não está sozinho neste duelo! Seus adversários também almejam a vitória, e farão do seu caminho um verdadeiro desafio!

—description from the designer (Portuguese)
